name: Ground Six
overview:
Ground Six invests in technology ideas. In exchange for equity, we work with tech entrepreneurs to help grow their business and get to market fast with a minimum viable product (MVP), marketing resource and international connections to get things done.

We’ve invested a significant amount of time recruiting entrepreneurial people with a flair for creative thinking. Our Ground Six values played an integral role in how the team was put together. Having the right technical, marketing and strategy skills and knowledge is just the start – having the right behaviours and attitude was equally important to us.

Our aim is to have a fluid team, one that can bend and flex with the ever-changing environment. Being driven by new things (and change itself) is an essential characteristic for everyone at the company, no matter what their role within the team. We have a great mix of business, technical and creative minds.
